name: Car Soccer 3D World Championship: Play Football Sport Game With Car Racing
name_original: Car Soccer 3D World Championship: Play Football Sport Game With Car Racing
description: Changing from a football player to the car player!! It sounds strange but interesting. What would it like if the car is used to play football? The only rule is control the car to hit the ball until it gets in to the goal as the level set. As in each level increases the point such as in the first level only passed by one point, and increasing to 2, 3 accordingly. It might sounds very easy. What level do you think you will be? Just touch the screen to control the car by using the joystick. Try to test your skill here .
